title:
nstructions
Mix together dry ingredients add milk and stir batter will be thick add onions and mix throughly heat 1/2 inch oil in skillet over medium high heat drop batter by tablespoons in hot oil flatten slightly brown on both sides until nice and crisp drain on paper towels as my son puts it now gobble them up
directions: heat 1/2 inch oil in skillet over medium high heat
drop batter by tablespoons in hot oil
brown on both sides until nice and crisp
as my son puts it now gobble them up
ingredients: 2 teaspoons Morton salt ( adjust the salt to your familyâ€™s taste I only use 1 teaspoon)
2 and 1/2 cups chopped onions about 2 small onions
